tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Manuscripts (
    id INT,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    year_published INT,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE manuscripts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    year_published INT,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE literary_works (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    year_published INT,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Manuscripts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    published_date DATE,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LiteraryWorks (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Archives (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    curator VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE LiteraryWorks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    genre TEXT,
    year_published INT
);

CREATE TABLE ManuscriptAuthors (
    manuscript_id INT,
    author_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (manuscript_id, author_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (manuscript_id) REFERENCES Manuscripts(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES Authors(id)
);
